LanguageData.erg_rifle.label: Electrothermal chemical rail rifle
LanguageData.erg_rifle.description: It is an electrothermal chemical rail rifle.\n\nIt uses a different principle from railguns to maximize damage by accelerating bullets with chemicals.
LanguageData.erg_rifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_rifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_LMG.label: light machine gun
LanguageData.erg_LMG.description: Line rail light machine gun.\n\nPower reduced for multiple shots, rapidly accelerating bullets in all directions.
LanguageData.erg_LMG.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_LMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_Handgun.label: Electrothermal chemical rail pistol
LanguageData.erg_Handgun.description: It's a line rail pistol.\n\nIt's a pistol-type weapon made as a secondary weapon. It's made as a secondary weapon, but its performance is usable.
LanguageData.erg_Handgun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_Handgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_Shotgun.label: Electrothermal chemical Rail Shotgun
LanguageData.erg_Shotgun.description: An electrothermal chemical shotgun that accelerates high-velocity bullets.\n\nA shotgun-type weapon that fires bullets that rapidly accelerate bullets through electrothermal chemistry, and fires multiple shots at once.(i guess this is called future america )
LanguageData.erg_Shotgun.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_Shotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_Anti_materiel_Rifle.label: anti-materiel sniper rifle
LanguageData.erg_Anti_materiel_Rifle.description: It is an Electrothermal rail anti-materiel sniper rifle .\n\nAn anti-tank sniper rifle designed to pierce hard armor and tank types. It accelerates armor-piercing bullets to fly quickly while maximizing damage to targets hit.
LanguageData.erg_Anti_materiel_Rifle.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_Anti_materiel_Rifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_gun_spear.label: Electrothermal chemical rail Gun Spear
LanguageData.erg_gun_spear.description: It is a Electrothermal chemical rail Gun Spear.\n\nIt is a weapon that combines a spear and a line rail gun. It has been modified to be a close-range weapon and can be used for close-range combat. The rail gun attached to the front of the spear can be used to approach or block enemies with short-range guns.
LanguageData.erg_gun_spear.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_gun_spear.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_gun_spear.tools.2.label: barrel
LanguageData.erg_barrel_accelerator.label: Electrothermal chemical Rail Shotgun
LanguageData.erg_barrel_accelerator.description: An electrothermal chemical shotgun that accelerates high-velocity bullets.\n\nA shotgun-type weapon that fires bullets that rapidly accelerate bullets through electrothermal chemistry, and fires multiple shots at once.(i guess this is called future america )
LanguageData.erg_barrel_accelerator.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.erg_barrel_accelerator.tools.1.label: barrel

LanguageData.Bullet_AP_ERG.label: ERG AP bullet
LanguageData.Bullet_HE_ERG.label: HE ERG bullet
